input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware (Set of 4), 16 oz, Glass

Product keywords:
Exquisitely designed to befit the most prestigious audience
16-ounce capacity iced beverage, perfect for all beverages
The classic design brings elegance and charm to the table
Sized conveniently to meet the needs of every occasion
Dishwasher safe; hand-washing recommended
Lead-free
Curvy shape with narrow stems
Product description:

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Mikasa is a leading manufacturer of superior quality stemware and giftware. The classic design of Mikasa drinkware brings elegance and charm to the table. The curvy shape with narrow stems and a 16-ounce capacity makes this the perfect glass for all beverages. Mikasa's fashionable and functional pieces are designed to meet the needs of every occasion. The elegant shape and classic design of this set of 4 drinkware makes it perfect for both everyday use and for special occasions. The set is made of lead-free crystal and is dishwasher safe. Hand washing is recommended. Set includes 4 exact-sized pieces.
input_text.Response B: The Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware is a set of 4 glasses that are created for a lifetime of enjoyment. The exquisitely designed glasses have a classic shape and narrow stems that are perfect for any occasion. The 16-ounce capacity glasses are made of lead-free glass and can be safely used in the dishwasher or hand-washed. The Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware is ideal for serving any type of cold drinks and is sure to impress your guests.
